txt.en: 'Are you looking to be welcomed into the inner circle of the Riders of Stangard? I can help you with that and make you a \qKindred\q of the Riders of Stangard.\n\n'If this sounds good to you, speak to me again!'
'Alright, soon you will be Kindred of the Riders of Stangard. Ready?'
Great River - Riders of Stangard IV
Talk to the friendly rep Man to continue
By completing this quest, you will be considered Kindred of the Riders of Stangard.
